name: Diomedes Adventure (GB)
description:
Description:
Diomedes Adventure was my first attempt with GB Studio to create a GamebBoy action (zelda, final fantasy-esque) game of that era.

Our hero, Diomedes is dragged into a power struggle between the Gods of the ancient Greek pantheon and is tasked to save mankind.

Note: Game does contain some adult language so users beware.

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow Keys — Move
(A) — Z (interact)
(B) — X (fight)
(START) — Return/Enter
(SELECT) — Shift
